g.text: User feedback during and after form submission
HTML: input type="text" name="botcheck" class="hidden" tabindex="-1"
CSS hidden from users; bots auto-fill. Filled = spam, rejected silently.
Button disabled with spinner while sending.
Hidden field traps bots. Filled = spam

svg.text: loading spinner | success confirmation | error with retry | offline queue | honeypot spam protection | state machine
